    • assertPermission

      public static void assertPermission​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender target, java.lang.String permission, java.lang.String message) throws CommandExecutionException
      Asserts target has permission. If it hasn't, throws CommandExecutionException with specified message (or default message if message is null).
      Parameters:
      target - target to assert
      permission - required permission
      message - message for CommandExecutionException. null for default
      Throws:
      CommandExecutionException

    • toInt

      public static int toInt​(java.lang.String source, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> messageFunc) throws CommandExecutionException
      Converts source to int. If failure, throws CommandExecutionException with specified message (or default if null).
      Parameters:
      source - conversion source
      messageFunc - Function for generate message via source
      Returns:
      integer
      Throws:
      CommandExecutionException

      messageFunc - Function for generate message via source
      Returns:

    • toEnum

      public static <E extends java.lang.Enum<E>> E toEnum​(java.lang.Class<E> clazz, java.lang.String source, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> messageFunc) throws CommandExecutionException
      Convert supplied string to Enum.
      Parameters:
      clazz - Class instance of Enum type
      source - string to convert
      messageFunc - for generate message from source string. null for default message.
      Returns:
      converted enum. this mustn't be null.
      Throws:
      CommandExecutionException - if failed to convert source to Enum
